The fire's continued at Oxford, or, The decree of the convocation for burning the Naked gospel, considered in a letter to a person of honour Parkinson, James, 1653-1722.
15 p.
s.n., [London? : 1690]
Caption title. Dated, p. 14: Aug. 30, 1690. "The naked gospel" was written by Arthur Bury. Advertisement on p. 15. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
